mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, IS_DELETED, IS_PUBLISH, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE ( USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, UPDATED_AT) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE
ID,
USER_ID,
TITLE,
CONTENT,
CREATED_AT,
IS_DELETED,
IS_PUBLISH,
UPDATED_AT,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_PUBLISH = #{isPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_PUBLISH = #{isPublish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE.*, T_SES_BMS_USER.REL_NAME AS USER_NAME FROM T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE INNER JOIN T_SES_BMS_USER ON T_SES_BMS_USER."ID" = T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE.USER_ID
WHERE T_SES_BMS_STATION_MESSAGE.TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
